Name: ArgumentException In AddModulesAsync
Description: A minor exception caused mainly when updating from Discord.Net 1.0.9 to Discord.Net 2.0

Name: Visual Studio Break on Exceptions
Description: Ensure the Visual Studio IDE breaks when an Exception is thrown.

Name: Running a discord bot in a Windows 7 machine
Description: How to run a discord bot in a Windows 7 machine, setting a compatible socket provider

Name: A MessageReceived handler is blocking the gateway task
Aliases: A MessageReceived handler is blocking the gateway task
Description: How to run a discord bot in a Windows 7 machine, setting a compatible socket provider

Name: BadArgCount
Description: Caused when you have a command that requires one or more parameters, however you give it less than it requires.

Name: Nuget packages
Description: Installing & Restoring Nuget Packages

Name: Basic Command Guide Discord.Net 2.0
Description: The basics of setting up your own custom command modules in Discord.Net 2.0

Name: Custom Preconditions Example
Description: This example will allow you to better understand the creation of custom Preconditions.

Name: Global Static Client & CommandService
Description: How to use a Global Static class to handle your Client & CommandService (Instead of Using Dependency Injection)

Name: Generate Help Embeds
Description: An extension of Discord.Net.Commands, mainly to get information about your commands as string, ideally to build a help command. Comes with a extension of the CommandService to build a help command easily! By Charly

Name: Embed Handler Addon
Description: This addon allows you to easily create simple Embeds and can be extended to allow the creation of more complex Embeds as you see fit.

Name: Using your own entities as Command Parameters & Converters
Description: This is a basic example of converting DSharpPlus entities to your own entities. Might be useful if you follow the Miunie architechture.

Name: Random Picker Using LINQ
Description: This class contains an extension method to any IEnumerable. This will allow you to append PickRandom() to any collection.

Name: Storing Data With JSON
Description: How to Serialize (Store) & Deserialize (Load) JSON data files.

Name: Basic Bot Example
Description: This is a basic bot you can use as a base for your Discord Bot Project, it has comments on all the main things you need to know. It's also using the latest best practices in terms of Dependency Injection and Services

Name: DeleteMessageAsync
Description: DeleteMessageAsync is a method you can use to (as the name says) deletes messaged for you.

Name: Custom Emojis
Description: Guides you through the several different ways to both find and send Custom Emojis in a Discord.Net or D#+ Bot.

Name: Bot Config Using JSON
Description: A simple example of how you can use JSON to store a bot config as-well as fully functioning DataStorage class to Retrieve or Store (Overwrite) a BotConfig.json file.

Name: Discord Client Events
Description: A list of every event you can add in the Discord.Net Library.

Name: Migrating from .NET Framework to .NET Core
Description: How to migrate from .NET Framework to .NET Core.

Name: Using Github Gist
Description: Click the link to create your very own gist. Remember to name it with the file extension, for example MyClass.cs
